name: Yossi Banai
description: '''Yosef "Yossi" Banai''' ({{langx|he|יוסף ״יוסי״ בנאי}}; April 13, 1932 – May 11, 2006) was an Israeli actor, singer, songwriter, comedian, and theater director. He received the [[Israel Prize]] for Theater in 1998 and the {{ill|Israeli Theater Prize|he|פרס התיאטרון הישראלי}} in 2004. Banai was widely regarded as a prominent figure in Israeli performing arts.
